From the people that brought you Google Home...
...comes the next evolution of the smart home...
Okay Gnome, what's the weather like outside?
The weather outside is sunny and 76 degrees.
Okay Gnome, turn on the hose I'm holding.
Okay Gnome, can I eat this lemon tree leaf?
Yes, but I wouldn't recommend it.
Okay, but I could eat it.
Okay Gnome, add milk to my shopping list.
I'm sorry, that sounds like an indoor request.
